text: "I Can't Make You Love Me" is a 1991 song by Bonnie Raitt and is the second single from her 11th studio album Luck of the Draw. It went to number 18 in the United States, number 22 in New Zealand, number 40 in Canada, number 43 in the Netherlands, number 50 in the United Kingdom and number 77 in Australia. ==George Michael version== In 1997, George Michael released a version of I Can't Make You Love Me as a double A-side to his single Older. It went to number 3 in the United Kingdom and number 6 in Scotland. == Boyz II Men version == In 2009, Boyz II Men released a version of I Can't Make You Love Me for their third covers album Love. == Priyanka Chopra version == In 2014, Priyanka Chopra released a version of I Can't Make You Love Me. title: I Can't Make You Love Me
